content: {A惊叹}What a fulfilling first day! As a thank-you for your help, I've got a little something for you... But before that, mind if I ask what kind of style you like?

content: {A挠头}Though there's still 159 items I hid around out of habit and haven't quite found yet... <style=SizeSmall>Alright! I'll go check every corner again before sunrise...</style>

content: No problem! This <style=Highlight>pants</style> gift box is one of our best picks. Hope you'll like it. <style=SizeSmall>I-It's not from those goods I hid under the tree...</style>

content: {A点头}Let's see... The cardboard towers are now neat displays, sales and buybacks are all set, and I even got to taste Captain Mo's tea and enjoyed a hearty meal!
